main_definition: Architects are professionals who design buildings, structures, and spaces, considering both aesthetic appeal and functional requirements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person skilled in planning and designing buildings
meanings_and_examples.example: The architect drew up detailed plans for the new office building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Experts who specialize in creating visual representations of structures or spaces before they are built
meanings_and_examples.example: The team of architects presented their 3D model to the client, showcasing how the interior would look like after construction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical term for people who construct ideas or plans in various fields (not just architecture)
meanings_and_examples.example: The marketing team acted as architects when they designed a comprehensive strategy to increase brand awareness.
